Description:
Senior and Dickson Limited - 2 x INs served re HSWA/COSHH/PUWER

312364683
IN-SF-17-03-22-1

You have failed in your duty to ensure employees, who are exposed to hazardous substances namely metal working fluids and associated mist are under a suitable programme of health surveillance.

312364735
IN-SF-17-03-22-2

You have failed in your duty to prevent access to any dangerous parts of machinery namely the WMW large pillar drill.
